tf_12200501_description: DIVEBOMB is a cheery sort, almost always in a good mood.  Nothing makes him happier then flying above battlefield full of targets to attack.  He never likes to surrender his independence to combine with his teammates to form PREDAKING.

tf_12200541_description: BUZZSAW is an artist that likes to make masterpieces out of his victims.  He loves to destroy them with what he believes is inspirational precision.  His ego, however, is easily wounded when he is interrupted while creating.

tf_12200561_description: During the early days of the war, THRUST’s thundering engines boomed out after the DECEPTICON’s many victories.  Later, as the AUTOBOTS grew in power and won more battles, THRUST often would flee like a coward at the first sign of danger.

tf_12200581_description: When the PREDACONS are on the hunt, their leader RAZORCLAW is all business.  He often lies in wait, completely motionless, for long stretches of time. Fools confuse this for laziness.  Many of them become his prey.

tf_12200601_description: A member of a squad of DECEPTICON air warriors known as "The Rainmakers," ACID STORM is highly intelligent, eager, and dedicated to the DECEPTICON cause. He has a talent for handling vast amounts of data, and is a powerful speaker.

tf_12300621_description: Lost in deep space and desperate to find the AUTOBOTS, RODIMUS and his crew pilot their damaged starship through a forgotten part of the universe. The DECEPTICONS continue to scour the cosmos to find and destroy him at all costs.

tutorial_battle_text_01: Defeat other players to win Battle Points.  Use them to gain powerful weapons through the Battle Points Space Bridge.
tutorial_battle_text_02: 战胜的对手越强，获得的积分越多。请从列表中选择对手。
tutorial_battle_text_03: 点击战斗，确定你的对手，同时会消耗1次对战魔方，激活所有对战增益。
tutorial_battle_text_04: TRANSFORMERS character cards that have been trans-scanned receive a bonus.
tutorial_battle_text_05: Win more battles to get weapons from the Battle Points Space Bridge.  And remember, your Battle Cubes will regenerate over time.
tutorial_boss_text_01: Your squad is now ready to fight this boss enemy. Defeat the boss and you will win his weapon!
tutorial_boss_text_02: Your squad defeated this boss, captured his weapon and gained access to a new battlefield! You can manage squads from the Team menu at your base.
tutorial_cyberdex_text_01: The Cyberdex keeps track of all  characters and weapons you discover in TRANSFORMERS LEGENDS. Can you find them all?
tutorial_faction_select_03: as your team leader? You will collect TRANSFORMERS character cards from both factions. This only determines your starting team.
tutorial_fusion_text_01: 强化你喜欢的角色卡片，让他们变得更强吧。
tutorial_fusion_text_02: Select the character card you want to upgrade. Hint: characters with a higher number on their portrait can be upgraded to a higher maximum level.
tutorial_fusion_text_03: Now add spare TRANSFORMERS character cards, as upgrade materials, by tapping an empty upgrade slot.
tutorial_fusion_text_04: Select up to eight character cards as upgrade materials.  Hint: adding more powerful materials will upgrade your character faster.
tutorial_fusion_text_05: Materials are selected and you are ready to start the upgrade process.
tutorial_fusion_text_06: 强化完成！不要忘记随时强化你喜欢的角色卡片。
tutorial_home_text_01: 这里是主画面，游戏中的几乎所有功能都集中在此。首先让我们来熟悉一下基础功能……
tutorial_home_text_02: Activate the Space Bridge to receive more TRANSFORMERS character and weapons cards.  Be sure to check here daily.
tutorial_home_text_03: Visit your base to manage your Battle Team and Mission Squads. You can also trans-scan, upgrade and view your TRANSFORMERS character cards.
tutorial_home_text_04: 不要忘记经常强化你喜欢的角色，提示其能力值。
tutorial_home_text_05: 你的终极目标就是要组建一支无敌军队！然后挑战其他玩家，赚取对战积分。
tutorial_home_text_06: Add TRANSFORMERS characters cards by completing missions. You will obtain more AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS by completing missions for both factions.
tutorial_home_text_07: Now you know your way around the Home Screen and are ready to begin your adventures. Try completing a few missions to get started.
tutorial_main_text_02: 现在，将你的领袖的机器人形态和机器形态进行匹配，来提示其能力值。
tutorial_main_text_022: Excellent! Now all of your leader's stats have improved and will receive Trans-scan bonuses in PvP Battles!
tutorial_main_text_03: 恭喜！你已经组建完成了一支9人的队伍了。现在可以开始你的冒险了！
tutorial_main_text_04: 让我们激活彩虹桥，获得其余的8名角色。
tutorial_main_text_051: .  I'm here to get you started and show you how to assemble the ultimate team of TRANSFORMERS characters!
tutorial_main_text_061: . This is his Robot Mode and his stats. Each character has a unique Robot Mode and Alt Mode.
tutorial_main_text_071: 的机器模式。如果得到了该角色的机器人模式和机器模式卡片，你就能进行形态匹配，提示其能力值。
tutorial_main_text_08: From the Main Menu,  you may embark on new adventures or activate the SPACE BRIDGE to get more TRANSFORMERS characters.
tutorial_main_text_082: Complete MISSIONS to get new TRANSFORMERS characters and BATTLE other players to earn weapons.
tutorial_mission_text_01: You can play AUTOBOT and DECEPTICON campaigns to collect characters from both factions. Select the first campaign now.
tutorial_mission_text_02: Campaigns unfold across multiple battlefields. Enter this battlefield and start your first mission.
tutorial_mission_text_022: Complete missions to collect new characters, earn credits and XP.  Tap the mission arrow to begin your first mission now.
tutorial_mission_text_023: 完成任务之后，你还可以重复完成以获得没有发现的角色！同时新的任务会开启。现在请继续执行第二个任务。
tutorial_mission_text_03: Scan mission environments until your progress reaches 100%. Each scan increases your XP and reduces your energon.
tutorial_mission_text_04: 敌人出现的时候，当瞄准十字线变为绿色，点击导弹进行拦截。如果表现完美的话，还能获得额外的金钱！
tutorial_mission_text_08: Boss enemies will try to block your progress. You have two squads, one per faction, to deploy in boss fights.  Go ahead and confront your first boss now!
tutorial_mission_text_09: You may now select AUTOBOT and DECEPTICON missions and build up your Battle Team with characters from both factions.
tutorial_sell_text_01: Your Base holds all weapon and TRANSFORMERS character cards.  Inspect or sell them here.
tutorial_team_text_01: This is your Battle Team used in PvP Battles. Tap RECOMMENDED TEAM to assign your best nine character cards to your team.
tutorial_team_text_02: Your most powerful character and weapons cards have been assigned to your Battle Team.  Tap CONFIRM to keep the recommended team.
tutorial_team_text_03: You have an excellent Battle Team!  Advanced players can choose to edit individual character and weapon assignments and set up squads for boss fights.
tutorial_transscan_text_01: You can make your TRANSFORMERS character cards more powerful by trans-scanning matching Robot and Alt Modes.
tutorial_transscan_text_02: Your Robot Mode character cards appear on this list when you own the matching Alt Mode card. You can select one for trans-scanning now.
tutorial_transscan_text_03: Your Alt Mode character cards appear on this list when you own the matching Robot Mode card. You can select one for trans-scanning now.
tutorial_transscan_text_04: You're ready to enhance this character card.  TRANS-SCAN now to combine the two modes into a significantly more powerful character card.
tutorial_transscan_text_05: No matching modes of the same character are available for trans-scanning.  Complete  Missions or open the Space Bridge to find more TRANSFORMERS characters!
tutorial_transscan_text_06: Your character card has been trans-scanned and received a Trans-scan Bonus in battle. TRANS-SCAN your favorite character cards to maximize their stats.
